variable.name: Age
variable.description: Age, at sampling, of the subject

variable.name: Catalog_ID
variable.description: Subject ID number assigned by NINDS Repository

variable.name: Clinical_Data_Source
variable.description: The source of the clinical data

variable.name: Clinician_Type
variable.description: Type of clinician that collected the clinical data

variable.name: Country_Origin
variable.description: Subject's country of birth

variable.name: Data collected by This data was collected by
variable.description: Define category of person who completed the form

variable.name: Ethnicity
variable.description: Subject's ethnicity

variable.name: Family History Amyotrophic lateral sclerosis
variable.description: The presence or absence of amyotrophic lateral sclerosis in the subject's blood relatives as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Family History Ataxia
variable.description: The presence or absence of ataxia in the subject's blood relatives as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Family History Autism
variable.description: The presence or absence of autism in the subject's blood relatives as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Family History Bipolar (manic-depressive)
variable.description: The presence or absence of bipolar disorder in the subject's blood relatives as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Family History Brain aneurysm
variable.description: The presence or absence of brain aneurysm in the subject's blood relatives as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Family History Cancer
variable.description: The presence or absence of cancer in the subject's blood relatives as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Family History Dementia
variable.description: The presence or absence of dementia in the subject blood relatives as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Family History Depression
variable.description: The presence or absence of depression in the subject's blood relatives as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Family History Diabetes
variable.description: The presence or absence of diabetes in the subject's blood relatives as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Family History Dystonia
variable.description: The presence or absence of dystonia in the subject's blood relatives as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Family History Epilepsy
variable.description: The presence or absence of epilepsy in the subject's blood relatives as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Family History Heart disease
variable.description: The presence or absence of heart disease in the subject's blood relatives as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Family History Hypertension
variable.description: The presence or absence of hypertension in the subject's blood relatives as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Family History memory loss
variable.description: The presence or absence of memory loss in the subject's blood relatives as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Family History Migraine
variable.description: The presence or absence of migraine in the subject's blood relatives as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Family History Multiple sclerosis
variable.description: The presence or absence of multiple sclerosis in the subject's blood relatives as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Family History Muscle disease
variable.description: The presence or absence of any type of muscle disease in the subject's blood relatives as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Family History Obsessive Compulsive
variable.description: The presence or absence of obsessive compulsive disorder in the subject's blood relatives as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Family History Other
variable.description: The clinician interviewing the subject asks about any other known medical illnesses in blood relatives and notes them as comments if they exist.

variable.name: Family History Schizophrenia
variable.description: The presence or absence of schizophrenia in the subject's blood relatives as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Family History Stroke
variable.description: The presence or absence of cerebrovascular disease in the subject's blood relatives as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Family History Suicide/Attempt
variable.description: The presence or absence of a suicide attempt in the subject's blood relatives as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Family History Tourettes
variable.description: The presence or absence of Tourette's syndrome in the subject's blood relatives as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Gender
variable.description: Gender of the subject

variable.name: In_Panel
variable.description: Indicates whether DNA from this subject is included in any panels available through the NINDS Repository catalog

variable.name: Longitudinal Data Is this data Longitudinal (Follow-Up) Data?
variable.description: Is the data longitudinal or an initial assessment

variable.name: Medical History Amyotrophic lateral sclerosis
variable.description: The presence or absence of amyotrophic lateral sclerosis in the subjects themselves as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Medical History Ataxia
variable.description: The presence or absence of ataxia in the subjects themselves as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Medical History Autism
variable.description: The presence or absence of autism in the subjects themselves as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Medical History Bipolar (manic-depressive)
variable.description: The presence or absence of bipolar disorder in the subjects themselves as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Medical History Brain aneurysm
variable.description: The presence or absence of brain aneurysm in the subjects themselves as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Medical History Cancer
variable.description: The presence or absence of cancer in the subjects themselves as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Medical History Dementia
variable.description: The presence or absence of dementia in the subjects themselves as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Medical History Depression
variable.description: The presence or absence of depression in the subjects themselves as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Medical History Diabetes
variable.description: The presence or absence of diabetes in the subjects themselves as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Medical History Dystonia
variable.description: The presence or absence of dystonia in the subjects themselves as determined by clinician's interview

variable.name: Medical History Epilepsy
variable.description: The presence or absence of epilepsy in the subjects themselves as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Medical History Heart disease
variable.description: The presence or absence of heart disease in the subjects themselves as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Medical History Hypertension
variable.description: The presence or absence of hypertension in the subjects themselves as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Medical History memory loss
variable.description: The presence or absence of memory loss in the subjects themselves as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Medical History Migraine
variable.description: The presence or absence of migraine in the subjects themselves as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Medical History Multiple sclerosis
variable.description: The presence or absence of multiple sclerosis in the subjects themselves as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Medical History Muscle disease
variable.description: The presence or absence of muscle disease in the subjects themselves as determined by clinical interview; if present, the clinical interview will describe the type of muscle disease and thus may capture disorders that result in weakness, but are not considered to be a disease of the muscle.

variable.name: Medical History Obsessive Compulsive
variable.description: The presence or absence of obsessive compulsive disorder in the subjects themselves as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Medical History Other
variable.description: The clinician interviewing the subject asks about any other medical illnesses and notes them as comments if they exist.

variable.name: Medical History Schizophrenia
variable.description: The presence or absence of schizophrenia in the subjects themselves as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Medical History Stroke
variable.description: The presence or absence of cerebrovascular disease in the subjects themselves as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Medical History Suicide/Attempt
variable.description: The subjects themselves endorses a past suicide attempt as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Medical History Tourettes
variable.description: The presence or absence of Tourette's syndrome in the subjects themselves as determined by clinician's interview.

variable.name: Optional data Handedness
variable.description: The subject has a hand preference (left, right), or uses both hands equally well (ambidextrous).

variable.name: Optional data MMSE (enter score and date)
variable.description: The score obtained in the Folstein Mini Mental Status examination.

variable.name: Optional data Neurological examination
variable.description: The subject either did (yes) or did not (no) undergo a neurological examination.

variable.name: Optional data smoking history
variable.description: Record of an individual's background with regard to smoking tobacco. This would include such factors as start date, end date (if applicable), number of cigarettes smoked, attempts to quit, and others.

variable.name: Optional data years smoking
variable.description: How many years did the person smoke - if the person is a current or former smoker?

variable.name: Race
variable.description: Race of the subject

variable.name: Type of Control Type of Control
variable.description: Defines the type of control

variable.name: Zip_Abbrev
variable.description: First 3 digits of subject's zip code
